snippet.title: The Darkness is Coming – DAWN: Darkness Awaits Teaser
snippet.description:
The night is not your ally. In the world of DAWN: Darkness Awaits, survival is more than just lasting until morning. The infected evolve, growing deadlier with every kill. The longer you stay, the greater the danger. 

DAWN is a relentless survival horror experience where every decision matters. Fight, flee, or fall to the darkness.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1938500/DAWN_Darkness_Awaits_Withstand_the_Night/

Join the Community: https://discord.gg/F6f7J357uX
